description: Styles for the tic-tac-toe frontend application, including theme management and layout styling.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers content and applies background and text colors based on the theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including its size and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with layout properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styled link used within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with specific styles for interaction states.
